item.description:
Hi Everyone,

For the December's meetup we have decided to try something different. We will have a christmas social commonwealth style! We will be meeting up with the Australian meet up group for some bowling and billards at Kings in Back Bay. I hope you can make it out and meet some of our commonwealth family from down under! This will be our Christmas social, so come and be merry with your fellow Canadians and Australians!

For more information, see http://www.backbaykin...

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Christmas Social - Commonwealth Style
